title: Twitter leads call for EU lawmakers to ‘think beyond Big Tech’ - TechCrunch
content: Twitter leads call for EU lawmakers to ‘think beyond Big Tech’  TechCrunch
description: In a formalization of an earlier Twitter-led push to try to exert influence over fast-forming European digital regulations, the social media firm has used its Twitter Spaces platform to host the official kick-off of a policy advocacy lobby group that’s being branded the Open Internet Alliance…
